author: Rebecca Shabad
title: Ivanka Trump skirted coronavirus guidelines to travel to N.J. for Passover, a report says
description: Ivanka Trump traveled to Trump National Golf Club in New Jersey last week to celebrate Passover despite federal guidelines that advise against non-essential travel and a stay-at-home order in Washington, D.C., according to The New York Times.
content: WASHINGTON Ivanka Trump and her family traveled to Trump National Golf Club in New Jersey last week to celebrate Passover despite federal guidelines that advise against non-essential travel and a stay-at-home order in effect in Washington, D.C., according to … [+2121 chars]
